# cdyads analyses
```{r}

mod2 <- run_jags(m2(), jags_data$jags, c('beta', 'sigma_beta1', 'sigma_beta2', 'gamma_beta1', 'gamma_beta2', 
                                         'gamma_beta3'))


sink("output3.txt")
summary(mod1$samples)
```
